MajorClaims.Text: a break of one year is good for young people after finishing their high school
a break should be necessarily allowed to young minds between their high school and university studies

Claims.Text: the sole purpose of education is to nurture a young mind and not thrust studies on them
a break will give students some time to refresh their systems, by traveling or following their hobbies
Working or traveling for some time, after high school, can help them to find their field of interest
A break can disturb the focus of students and prove detrimental

Premises.Text: when students start their university studies after a break, they will feel fresh and full of energy to take the new challenge
A relaxation of one year to young minds will give them a quintessential change
A continuous study pressure for over 10 years makes the mind saturated and like a robot, to follow instructions
It will also help them to learn professional setup by working
Financially, students can save a little money to support their university education by doing a job
Some students even utilize this time for preparation of their desired university course
Students can also indulge in smoking or drinking during this time
When students work during these breaks, the feel of money gives them an illusion that such salary is enough for them and they go in a utopia
my cousin started working in a customer care centre after high school and got distracted
When he started his university studies, he failed miserably
A break gives students more benefits than harms
It varies from individual to individual, how they utilize that period
